short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link your sportsbook account with any sports media / tool provider in the SharpSports network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you the ability to sync your betting history from all major US sportsbooks so you can analyze, share and improve your performance.
